mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.FILENAME AS FILENAME, B.REG_DTTM AS FILE_DTTM FROM TBL_MEMBER A, TBL_IMAGE B WHERE 1=1 AND A.ID = B.REG_ID AND B.REG_DTTM = (SELECT MAX(REG_DTTM) FROM TBL_IMAGE WHERE 1=1 AND REG_ID = #{id} ) AND A.ID = #{id} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET password = #{password} , name = #{name} , nick_name = #{nick_name}# , email = #{email} , mobile1 = #{mobile1}# , mobile2 = #{mobile2}# , mobile3 = #{mobile3}# , hom_phone1 = #{hom_phone1}# , hom_phone2 = #{hom_phone2}# , hom_phone3 = #{hom_phone3}# , post_no = #{post_no}# , road_address = #{road_address}# , jibun_address = #{jibun_address}# , CHG_DTTM = NOW() WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET USE_YN = 'N' , CHG_DTTM = NOW() , QUIT_DTTM = NOW() WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE 1=1 AND ID=#{id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_IMAGE ( IMGNO, FILENAME, FILESIZE, REG_ID, REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(IMGNO),0)+1 FROM TBL_IMAGE A), #{filename}, #{filesize}, #{parentPK}, NOW(), NULL, NULL )
